SINGER SM024 Electric Sewing Machine

The Singer SM024 Electric Sewing Machine provides the luxurious features of a more costly machine in a tiny package. The SM024 has an automated needle threader, twin needle, and drop feed for free-motion sewing, so you can stitch with a professional finish. Hobbyists will appreciate its quick threading and dependable stitching, whether they use the 4-step buttonhole function or the all-purpose foot and free arm to make fine hems and cuffs. A sturdy all-metal frame provides the consistent support that Singer sewing machines are known for. Under the bright LED illumination, the needle feeder and simple winding front-load bobbin are visible stitches by stitch.

24 Built-in stitches, 4-step buttonhole

The Singer SM024 Sewing Machine is capable of basic, stretch, and decorative stitches for a variety of sewing techniques and textiles. Make buttonholes in four simple steps! The Stitch Selector Dial displays the steps.

Automatic needle threader & Front loading bobbin

The Singer SM024 threads the needle effortlessly, saving time. Bobbins wind and insert easily while keeping a smooth needle plate surface.

Reverse operation & Free arm design

The reverse lever on this sewing machine makes it simple to sew in reverse. It simply pulls out the accessories compartment to get access to the machine's free arm. The free arm makes sewing hems, sleeve cuffs, and other tiny or tubular items a breeze.

Drop feed & Variable stitch length

Lowering the feed dogs allows for button and free-motion stitching. Lower the feed teeth by swiping the Drop Feed Lever. To re-engage the feed dogs, slide it back and fully crank the handwheel to elevate the feed teeth. It Increases or decreases the space between stitches to easily alter the look of your chosen stitch. This feature is useful for a variety of stitch methods.

1 x Staybright LED light & Snap-on presser feet

Long-lasting lighting illuminates well while remaining cool to the touch. Presser feet that snap on. The snap-on presser feet are simply removed and replaceable. The Singer SM024 Electric Sewing Machine comes with a 01-year service warranty.
